block.p: N.B.A. SEATTLE SUPERSONICS--Signed G Randy Livingston to a contract for the remainder of the season.
Women's N.B.A. HOUSTON COMETS--Signed F Jillian Robbins.
Canadian Football League WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS--Acquired DB Jason Nugent and a 2007 fifth-round draft pick from Edmonton for DT Ron Warner and a 2007 fourth-round draft pick.

Arena Football League ARIZONA RATTLERS--Released OL-DL Kelvin Ingram. LAS VEGAS GLADIATORS--Waived DB Vontez Duff, QB Shaun King and DB Dahnel Singfield. NEW ORLEANS VOODOO--Signed WR Carl Bond from the practice squad. TAMPA BAY STORM--Re-signed OL-DL Thaddeus Bullard and DL Clint Mitchell.

N.H.L. ANAHEIM DUCKS--Recalled D Aaron Rome from Portland (AHL). COLORADO AVALANCHE--Signed D Ray Macias and F T.J. Hensick to three-year contracts. OTTAWA SENATORS--Re-signed D Chris Phillips to a four-year contract. PHOENIX COYOTES--Fired Michael Barnett, general manager and senior executive vice president, Cliff Fletcher, senior executive vice president of hockey operations, and Laurence Gilman, senior vice president and assistant general manager. VANCOUVER CANUCKS--Assigned D Daniel Rahimi to Manitoba (AHL).
N.B.A. SEATTLE SUPERSONICS--Signed G Randy Livingston to a contract for the remainder of the season.
Women's N.B.A. HOUSTON COMETS--Signed F Jillian Robbins.
Canadian Football League WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS--Acquired DB Jason Nugent and a 2007 fifth-round draft pick from Edmonton for DT Ron Warner and a 2007 fourth-round draft pick.

Arena Football League ARIZONA RATTLERS--Released OL-DL Kelvin Ingram. LAS VEGAS GLADIATORS--Waived DB Vontez Duff, QB Shaun King and DB Dahnel Singfield. NEW ORLEANS VOODOO--Signed WR Carl Bond from the practice squad. TAMPA BAY STORM--Re-signed OL-DL Thaddeus Bullard and DL Clint Mitchell.

N.H.L. ANAHEIM DUCKS--Recalled D Aaron Rome from Portland (AHL). COLORADO AVALANCHE--Signed D Ray Macias and F T.J. Hensick to three-year contracts. OTTAWA SENATORS--Re-signed D Chris Phillips to a four-year contract. PHOENIX COYOTES--Fired Michael Barnett, general manager and senior executive vice president, Cliff Fletcher, senior executive vice president of hockey operations, and Laurence Gilman, senior vice president and assistant general manager. VANCOUVER CANUCKS--Assigned D Daniel Rahimi to Manitoba (AHL).
